attributes.name: popper-class
attributes.desc: custom class name for the popup menu

attributes.name: show-timeout
attributes.desc: timeout before showing a sub-menu(inherit show-timeout of the menu by default.)

attributes.name: hide-timeout
attributes.desc: timeout before hiding a sub-menu(inherit hide-timeout of the menu by default.)

attributes.name: teleported
attributes.desc: whether popup menu is teleported to the body, the default is true for the level one SubMenu, false for other SubMenus

attributes.name: popper-offset
attributes.desc: offset of the popper (overrides the popper of menu)

attributes.name: expand-close-icon
attributes.desc: Icon when menu are expanded and submenu are closed, expand-close-icon and expand-open-icon need to be passed together to take effect

attributes.name: expand-open-icon
attributes.desc: Icon when menu are expanded and submenu are opened, expand-open-icon and expand-close-icon need to be passed together to take effect

attributes.name: collapse-close-icon
attributes.desc: Icon when menu are collapsed and submenu are closed, collapse-close-icon and collapse-open-icon need to be passed together to take effect

attributes.name: collapse-open-icon
attributes.desc: Icon when menu are collapsed and submenu are opened, collapse-open-icon and collapse-close-icon need to be passed together to take effect
